Header: Ott Tänak dominant at Portugal Rally
Content: Ott Tänak asserted his dominance at the Portugal Rally, extending his lead to 15.2 seconds over Jari-Matti Latvala and Kris Meeke who was 21.7 seconds behind the leader at the end of stage 6. The top three represented a 1-2-3 for Toyota. The day started for Hyundai teamates Dani Sordo and Sébastien Loeb who saw their lead over taken and fuel problems that left them in the dust. The rally continues in Vieira do Minho through out the day.
